comments.body: I am lost in this simplification, but it looks good. Do you know why before it was going through an int ptr(ptr)?

It was just a mistake. There was an extra dereference that should not be there in the first place, since we get the object address already from `GetCPPInstanceAddress`. I pointed this out to Wim in:
https://bitbucket.org/wlav/cppyy/issues/100/ascobject-passes-wrong-address-to
and he committed the same change to upstream Cppyy:
https://bitbucket.org/wlav/cpycppyy/commits/dd55fb891de9a99a5094a25dbf05830da53ad6e0
